name: Round Rain
description:
Round rain is a simple game resembling a cross between Breakout and Pinball. Try to keep the little grey dot afloat as long as possible. See how many times you can get the dot through the hoop, but watch out for hitting the ground.

Featuring:

  • Physics based interactions
  • Ambient and relaxing thunderstorm soundscape (credit goes to Arctura )
  • 3 different obstacles, which can help or hinder your progress
  • Bonus dot to help you on your way
  • A hidden cheat code - drop me a line on twitter if you want to know what it is

This game was made as part of a weekly game challenge and for a lonely game developer to get more twitter friends... erm say hi: https://twitter.com/emiru84

** one or two bugs with the pause functionality still need to be ironed out, but nothing game breaking found so far
